overview: TrenchcoatX.com's Gamer Girls is a collection of fun and fantastic vignette scenes featuring cosplay, fantasy scenarios, and real life gamers. Gamer Girl April O'Neil has a sexual fixation on her favorite video game character, Jiz. Jiz doesn't seem to be all that aware of the situation, given the fact that Jiz only lives inside of a digital war zone. But when April happens upon a hidden easter egg, Jiz comes to life. Jenna and Ayumi are a match made in heaven, but when Ayumi beats Jenna one too many times at their favorite video game, she must find a way to win Jenna's favor back. When Katrina's boyfriend refuses to divert his attention from his video games to her, Katrina tries her go-to distraction. When that doesn't work either, she pulls out the big guns. Literally.
title: Gamer Girls
